summary: Male and Female Khajiit HD Textures w/ Normals.
descriptionHtml:
The Khajiit\'s looked a little dull to me. I used some real fur textures from my cat Ozzie and from various other cats, blended them with the original and sharpened it a little.

The textures are scaled at 4096x4096. They have HD normals to go with them. Lots of normal map edits have been blurred to decrease blocki-ness. But with the Khajiits it looks really nice sharpened and gives off a fuzzier look to the fur.

If you do not like the new normals just delete all of the files with \"_msn\" in the name.

I\'m probably not going to change these as they were pretty much for myself, but I figured that someone out there may like them.

I will most likely continue to update these and perhaps put a little more work into them, I\'ll probably move onto the Argonians after.

Credits to Reptiley for the base textures [url=Khajiit Fur]http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=996&navtag=file/images.php?id=996&tab=3[/url]
author: Nervous White Dads
